content:
cfallin commented on issue #4008:

@maekawatoshiki thanks for this PR! Unfortunately this is actually an outdated document in another way: it describes the old Cranelift register allocator that no longer exists, and it appears we just forgot to delete it at the same time that we removed the code. If you want to convert this PR into a deletion of the file instead, though, I'd be happy to merge that.

maekawatoshiki commented on issue #4008:

@cfallin Okay, then I'll close this PR and make a new one for deletion. Thanks

maekawatoshiki edited a comment on issue #4008:

@cfallin Okay, then I'll close this PR and make a new one for deletion. Thank you.
